bike.description: Specialized TriCross E5 SLX aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld semi-compact Freeroad design, FACT carbon seatstays w/ Zertz inserts, rack and fender fittings, integrated headset

components.description: S-Works Tricross fork, full FACT carbon monocoque w/ SpeedZertz, rack and fender fittings
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1-1/8" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge bearings, 20mm alloy cone with one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Comp-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Specialized CX Pro 2014 alloy, short drop
Specialized S-Wrap, cork ribbon w/ 2.5 gel pads
Silver cage/black body, w/ black toe clips and strap
Roval Pavé, aluminum, anti-pinch rim edge, sleeve joint, w/ stainless steel eyelets
Roval Pavé, 20h, cold forged aluminum five-spoke high flange, adjustable aluminum axle, Roval QR
Roval Pavé, 24h, cold forged aluminum five-spoke high flange, adjustable aluminum axle, Roval QR
Specialized Borough Pro, 700x32c, aramid bead, 120TPI, Dual Compound
Specialized Borough Pro, 700x32c, aramid bead, 120TPI, Dual Compound
Body Geometry Rival road, w/ Cr-Mo rails
Specialized Comp, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, aluminum head, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
